name: Nick Ganiron
text: I love pizza, a lrg meat lover w/cheesee crust, my wife ate 2 pieces, I eat the rest. For best results order online, allow extra time for when to pick up. They have always been in full crank busy when I pick up during diner time but my pizza stay ready, correct and hot.
